confidentiality.notes: Names, usernames, email addresses and passwords dumped on the Internet

summary: Names, usernames, email addresses and passwords dumped on the Internet

victim.notes: Technically, the LDRC is based in Ontario, Canada with our server and development team located in the city of Toronto. But, because the LDRC is a virtual organization, we are not restricted to serving individuals from a specific region or locale. Many of us are members of the University of Toronto's Adaptive Technology Resource Centre (ATRC) research and development team. Our location/mailing address is:  LDRC Adaptive Technology Resource Centre University of Toronto 130 St. George St. First Floor Toronto, Ontario Canada, M5S 3H1
